ai-kv22.8:1.1_0: all things in the moment of the mind:
ai-kv22.8:1.3_0: The great earth, the king of mountains, stays in the ocean, and the grasses readily stands and stays firmly.
ai-kv22.8:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv22.8:2.1_0: all things in the moment of the mind:
ai-kv22.8:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv22.8:2.7_0: Shouldn’t he said to Venerable Sāriputta:
ai-kv22.8:2.8_0: “Reverends, though the eye is intact internally, so long as exterior sights don’t come into range and there’s no corresponding engagement, there’s no manifestation of the corresponding type of consciousness.
ai-kv22.8:2.9_0: Though the eye is intact internally and exterior sights come into range, so long as there’s no corresponding engagement, there’s no manifestation of the corresponding type of consciousness.
ai-kv22.8:2.10_0: But when the eye is intact internally and exterior sights come into range and there is corresponding engagement, there is the manifestation of the corresponding type of consciousness.”
ai-kv22.8:3.4_0: body-consciousness, and body-contact together with the body-consciousness.
ai-kv22.8:3.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv22.8:3.6_0: body-consciousness, and body-contact together with the body-consciousness.
ai-kv22.8:3.8_0: Shouldn’t he said to Venerable Sāriputta:
ai-kv22.8:3.9_0: “The internally and exterior touches don’t come into range. ...
ai-kv22.8:3.10_0: They don’t come internally and exterior touches ...
ai-kv22.8:3.11_0: But when the body is intact internally and exterior sights come into range and there is corresponding engagement, there is the manifestation of the corresponding type of consciousness.”
ai-kv22.8:4.2_0: “For one in mind, all things are moment.”
ai-kv22.8:4.4_0: all things are permanent, eternal, and imperishable.
ai-kv22.8:4.5_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv22.8:4.6_0: and at that time all of the one-place:
ai-kv22.8:4.7_0: The account of the opportunity is finished.
ai-kv22.8:4.8_0: with the twenty purgatives, at the Bārāṇasī,
ai-kv22.8:5.1_0: There is something that’s prone to being fettered.
ai-kv22.8:5.2_0: Although the one with mind free from enmity,
ai-kv22.8:5.4_0: There is the penetration of the Dhamma,
ai-kv22.8:5.5_0: There is no way to conceive her.
ai-kv22.8:5.6_0: There is a penetration of the Dhamma,
ai-kv22.8:5.7_0: and there is shelter for attaining perfection.
ai-kv22.8:5.9_0: there is no sorrow in the forest,
ai-kv22.8:5.10_0: all things in the moment of the mind:
